title: Together
creator_credit: Denis Horn, Lorenzo Mazzetti and British Film Institute
brief_description: The story of two deaf mutes who work on the docks and live together in a dingy lodging house. A study in isolation - influenced by the Italian neo-realist school. One of the first films of the British ‘Free Cinema’ movement.
creator_credit_for_label: Denis Horn, Lorenzo Mazzetti and British Film Institute
